hero.title: Journey through our fragrances
hero.subtitle: Unique creations, 100% vegan, imagined and handcrafted with passion in our workshop-boutique in Namur.

intro.title: The story of a dream come true
intro.paragraph1: NeZ ZeN is the meeting between Romain's NeZ (Nose), a passionate perfumer, and Aurélie's ZeN, who welcomes you in a relaxed and warm atmosphere.
intro.paragraph2: Together, they create unique perfumes inspired by travels, songs, moments of life. Each bottle tells a story, perhaps yours.

philosophie.title: Our approach
philosophie.subtitle: Four principles guide each of our creations

jus.title: The "Juice" at the center
jus.description: Distinctive creations with a minimum of 20% aromatic materials. The quality of the perfume comes first.

experience.title: A unique experience
experience.description: Discover our raw materials, follow our personalized advice to find THE perfume that suits you.

transparence.title: Transparency
transparence.description: Our manufacturing process is open. Come and see how our elixirs are prepared and what makes them unique.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Creations that go off the beaten path, far from conventional perfumes. Originality is our signature.

parfums.title: Our creations
parfums.subtitle: Discover our artisan perfumes, each tells a unique story

refill.title: Embrace the "Refill Attitude"
refill.subtitle: Because every gesture counts, we offer refillable bottles and a refill loyalty card.

refill.title: Refillable bottles
refill.description: Keep your bottle, we take care of the rest

refill.quote: Reducing our ecological impact is important to us.

ateliers.title: Discover our workshops
ateliers.subtitle: The Nose and the Zen will be delighted to share their craft and passion with you
ateliers.description: Whether you want to discover the perfumer's craft, create your candle, or experience a unique sensory experience around wine, we have the workshop for you.

cta.title: Want to visit us?
cta.subtitle: Come discover our workshop-boutique and let Romain and Aurélie guide you on a unique olfactory journey.

meta.title: Our Creations
meta.description: Discover all our artisan creations: perfumes, home fragrances, cosmetics and more.

hero.title: Our Creations
hero.subtitle: Each creation is imagined and crafted in our Namur workshop, with passion and artisan expertise.

parfums.title: Perfumes
parfums.description: A collection of unisex perfumes, inspired by travels, songs, moments of life. Each fragrance tells a story.

nezzenHome.title: NeZZen Home
nezzenHome.description: Reed diffusers and scented candles to create a unique atmosphere in your home.

cosmetiques.title: Cosmetics
cosmetiques.description: Shower gels and body lotions with fragrances from our collection, carefully formulated.

packDecouverte.title: Discovery Pack
packDecouverte.description: Test our perfumes before you decide. In store with personalized advice or delivered to your home.

bonsCadeau.title: Gift Cards
bonsCadeau.description: Give a unique olfactory experience. Valid on all our products and workshops.

info.title: Our quality commitment
info.description: All our creations are 100% vegan, mostly made from natural ingredients, and handcrafted in Namur.

meta.title: Our Perfumes
meta.description: Discover our collection of artisan unisex perfumes, 100% vegan, created with passion in Namur.

hero.title: Our Perfumes
hero.subtitle: Each fragrance is an invitation to travel, a story to discover, a memory to create.

parfums.resultsCount: {count, plural, =0 {No perfumes} =1 {1 perfume} other {# perfumes}} in this selection

info.refill: All our bottles are refillable. Take advantage of our refill loyalty card!

cta.info: Order by phone, email or in store

related.title: You may also like
related.subtitle: Other creations from the same olfactory family

meta.title: Discovery Pack
meta.description: Test our perfumes before choosing your bottle. Two exclusive online formulas to find your olfactory signature.

hero.title: Find your perfume
hero.subtitle: Because choosing a perfume takes time, test our creations at home before making your decision.

decouverte.title: Discovery Pack
decouverte.description: Receive 4 samples to test at home. Once you've made your choice, we'll send you the 50ml bottle of your favorite perfume.

echantillons.title: Sample Pack
echantillons.description: Choose 5 perfume samples and receive them directly at home. Ideal for discovering our collection at a low price.

packDecouverte.orderNote: Specify your perfumes in the notes section when ordering

info.title: Why test before buying?
info.description: A perfume evolves on your skin throughout the day. Top notes give way to heart notes, then base notes. Testing a sample for several days allows you to truly discover a perfume and make the right choice.
info.quote: "Perfume is an encounter between a fragrance and your skin. Take time for this discovery."
info.author: Romain, NeZ ZeN perfumer

footer.description: Each fragrance is an invitation to travel, created with passion in our Namur workshop.
